## Vector3.axisNZ() method

Creates a new Vector2 pointing in the negative direction of the Z axis, i.e. vec3(0, 0, -1)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNZ(): Vector3;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The new vector
